Text:
I heard that the update fixes the bug of unlimited golden keys.. 

(Use Notepad to open up the WillowDLC.ini file located in the GAME FOLDERDLCPOPremierClubLic folder. Edit the file similar to the following:

[GoldenKeys]
+SourceId=254
+NumKeys=99

...to get 99 golden keys. )

Is there a way to make cracked Borderlands 2 recognise the saves from first game? I want that custom head :D

@Kashim22

As long as you have your Borderlands save games in the default save location (My Games in My Documents) it should be detected automatically.

hi, im confused wether to install this update or not. i want to play coop through tunngle. but it said to block the program through firewall, it'll disable lan multiplayer right ?
how do i unpack?

@ lolindir356

I'm using a ver from Ka0s, and its working fine even with tunngle. I haven't blocked it with any firewall for obvious reason. Also, all this update does is block the skeleton key exploit and nothing else. So, like me if ur game is working without any issues, theres no point in updating it right now. Wait for future updates that provides significant changes before updating :D

@ axxle

u can use softs like 7zip/winrar for unpacking.
if u r using it for the 1st time, then, install any of the above two softs>>double click the downloaded package>>(if it doesn't associate automatically then) use Open/Open with>>browse from installed softwares>>search for the location where u installed the above software>>choose the .exe (7zip/winrar)>>Hit Ok>>done...

njoy :)
